thread.title: United Airlines halt lifted, delays expected
thread.title_full: United Airlines halt lifted, delays expected

author: Laura Furr
title: United Airlines halt lifted, delays expected
text: United Airlines halt lifted, delays expected Jul 8, 2015, 9:00am CDT Updated Kim White/BLOOMBERG Chicago-based United Airlines has grounded all U.S. flights because of an automationâ€¦ more After grounding all U.S. departures due to an "automation issue" on July 8, United Airlines (NYSE: UAL) flights are up and running according to various media sources , but delays are still expected. NBC News reported that 3,500 flights were affected by the grounding that was issued around 7:45 a.m. The delays could reach 235 domestic and 138 international destinations, NBC estimated. Bloomberg Business reported that the Chicago-based airline experienced a network connectivity issue and is working to resolve the issue. Bizspace Spotlight
